detail.content: MLP Medical Language Processing — Medical Tag Set        MEDICAL XML TAG HIERARCHY  by Dr. David Rothwell, M.D., Dr. Richard Wheeler, M.D. and Dr. Ngô Thanh Nhàn  available from the Health Language Center  May 02, 2015 23:05:27    cf. Bruegel, R.B., Rothwell, D.J. & Wheeler, R. 2000. New View of Health Information . Advance for Health Information Executives 4.8 (August 2000): 39-44 & 80. Merion Publications, Inc.
